info.title: ME TT DataPortal Data Portal API
info.description: ME TT DataPortal Data Portal APIs to fetch Gut Microbes Genomes / Genes information.

get.description: Get all available species

parameters.name: species_acronym

schema.description: Acronym for the species (BU or PV).
schema.title: Species Acronym

parameters.description: Acronym for the species (BU or PV).

parameters.name: query

schema.description: Search term to match against genome names or metadata.
schema.title: Query

parameters.description: Search term to match against genome names or metadata.

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: Number of genomes to return per page.
schema.title: Per Page

parameters.description: Number of genomes to return per page.

parameters.name: isolates

schema.description: Optional list of isolate names to filter.
schema.title: Isolates

parameters.description: Optional list of isolate names to filter.

get.description: Retrieves genomes under a given species with pagination and sorting.

get.summary: Search genomes by species and query string

parameters.name: species_acronym

schema.description: Acronym for the species (BU or PV).
schema.title: Species Acronym

parameters.description: Acronym for the species (BU or PV).

parameters.name: query

schema.description: Search term to match against genome names or metadata.
schema.title: Query

schema.title: Isolates

parameters.description: Optional list of isolate names to filter.

get.description: Performs a search for genomes within a specific species with pagination and sorting.
Returns a list of genomes that are designated as type strains. Type strains represent reference genomes for a given species and are essential for comparative analysis and classification.

parameters.name: query

schema.description: Search term to match against genome names or metadata.
schema.title: Query

parameters.description: Search term to match against genome names or metadata.

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: Number of genomes to return per page.
schema.title: Per Page

parameters.description: Number of genomes to return per page.

parameters.name: isolates

schema.description: Optional list of isolate names to filter.
schema.title: Isolates

parameters.description: Optional list of isolate names to filter.

get.description: Searches genomes using a free-text query string. Returns a paginated list of matching genome records. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name' or 'species'.
Retrieves genome records for one or more isolate names. Accepts a comma-separated list of isolate names as input. Useful for batch lookups when isolate identifiers are known.
Retrieves a paginated list of all genomes available in the system. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name' or 'species'.

parameters.name: isolate_name

schema.description: Unique isolate name identifying the genome.
schema.title: Isolate Name

parameters.description: Unique isolate name identifying the genome.

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: Number of genes to return per page.
schema.title: Per Page

parameters.description: Number of genes to return per page.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of genes associated with a specific genome isolate. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name', 'gene_name', 'alias', 'seq_id', 'locus_tag' and 'product'. Useful for viewing all genes within a selected genome.

get.summary: Get essentiality data by genome and contig

parameters.name: ref_name

schema.description: Reference sequence (e.g. contig_1) name to retrieve essentiality data for.
schema.title: Ref Name

parameters.description: Reference sequence (e.g. contig_1) name to retrieve essentiality data for.

get.description: Retrieves cached essentiality data for a given genome isolate and reference name (e.g. contig_1). Returns gene essentiality information grouped by contig. This data is typically precomputed and used to visualize gene essentiality in genome browsers or analysis tools.

get.summary: Get drug MIC data for a strain
get.description: Retrieves drug MIC (Minimum Inhibitory Concentration) data for a specific strain. Returns paginated MIC measurements including drug names, values, units, and experimental conditions.

get.summary: Get drug metabolism data for a strain
get.description: Retrieves drug metabolism data for a specific strain. Returns paginated degradation percentages, statistical significance, and metabolizer classifications.

get.summary: Get all drug data for a strain
get.description: Retrieves both drug MIC and metabolism data for a specific strain. Returns comprehensive drug response information including resistance and metabolism patterns. No pagination is applied as this endpoint returns complete datasets for both MIC and metabolism data.

parameters.name: query

schema.description: Free-text search term to match against gene names or locus tags.
schema.title: Query

parameters.description: Free-text search term to match against gene names or locus tags.

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: Number of genes to return per page.
schema.title: Per Page

parameters.description: Number of genes to return per page.

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Unique locus tag identifier for the gene (e.g., 'ABC_123').
schema.title: Locus Tag

parameters.description: Unique locus tag identifier for the gene (e.g., 'ABC_123').

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific gene using its unique locus tag. Returns metadata and functional annotation associated with the gene. This endpoint is useful for direct lookups when the locus tag is already known.

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: Number of genes to return per page.
schema.title: Per Page

parameters.description: Number of genes to return per page.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all genes across all available genomes. Supports optional sorting by 'isolate_name', 'gene_name', 'alias', 'seq_id', 'locus_tag' and 'product'. Useful for browsing the full gene catalog without applying filters.

get.summary: Advanced gene search across genomes and species

parameters.name: isolates

schema.description: Comma-separated list of isolate names to filter.
schema.title: Isolates

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of isolate names to filter.

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Exact locus tag to search for (takes precedence over query if provided).

parameters.description: Exact locus tag to search for (takes precedence over query if provided).

schema.description: Field to sort results by, e.g., 'gene_name', 'isolate_name'.

parameters.description: Field to sort results by, e.g., 'gene_name', 'isolate_name'.

schema.description: Sequence ID (contig/chromosome) to filter genes by coordinate range.

get.summary: Get proteomics evidence for a gene

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID (e.g., 'BU_ATCC8492_00001')
schema.title: Locus Tag

parameters.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID (e.g., 'BU_ATCC8492_00001')

get.description: Retrieves proteomics evidence data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with all proteomics evidence entries including coverage, unique peptides, unique intensity, and evidence flag.

get.summary: Get essentiality data for a gene

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID
schema.title: Locus Tag

parameters.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID

get.description: Retrieves essentiality data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with essentiality data including TnSeq metrics, essentiality calls, and experimental conditions.

get.summary: Get fitness data for a gene

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID
schema.title: Locus Tag

parameters.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID

get.description: Retrieves fitness data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with fitness data including log fold change, FDR, and experimental conditions.

get.summary: Get mutant growth data for a gene

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID
schema.title: Locus Tag

parameters.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID

get.description: Retrieves mutant growth data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with mutant growth data including doubling times, biological replicates, and experimental conditions.

get.summary: Get reactions data for a gene

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID
schema.title: Locus Tag

parameters.description: Gene locus tag or UniProt ID

get.description: Retrieves metabolic reactions data for a specific gene using its locus tag or UniProt ID. Returns basic gene information along with reaction identifiers, GPR rules, and metabolites.

parameters.name: max_results

schema.description: Maximum number of results to return
schema.title: Max Results

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.description: Get all genes correlated with a specific gene, ordered by correlation strength

parameters.name: orthology_type

schema.description: Filter by orthology type (1:1, many:1, etc.)
schema.title: Orthology Type

parameters.description: Filter by orthology type (1:1, many:1, etc.)

parameters.name: max_results

schema.description: Maximum number of results to return
schema.title: Max Results

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.description: Get all orthologous genes for a specific gene across species
Get all operons that contain a specific gene

parameters.name: query

schema.description: Search term for drug name, class, or strain
schema.title: Query

parameters.description: Search term for drug name, class, or strain

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Sort field (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name). Uses keyword fields for sorting.
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Sort field (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name). Uses keyword fields for sorting.

get.description: Search drug MIC (Minimum Inhibitory Concentration) data across all strains. Supports filtering by drug name, class, species, MIC values, and experimental conditions. Returns paginated results with detailed MIC measurements. Note: Sorting is limited to top-level fields (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name).

get.summary: Get MIC data by drug name
get.description: Retrieves MIC data for a specific drug across all strains. Supports pagination and optional species filtering.

parameters.name: query

schema.description: Search term for drug name, class, or strain
schema.title: Query

parameters.description: Search term for drug name, class, or strain

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Sort field (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name). Uses keyword fields for sorting.
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Sort field (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name). Uses keyword fields for sorting.

get.description: Search drug metabolism data across all strains. Supports filtering by drug name, class, species, statistical significance, degradation percentages, and experimental conditions. Returns paginated results with detailed metabolism measurements. Note: Sorting is limited to top-level fields (isolate_name, species_acronym, species_scientific_name).

get.summary: Get metabolism data by drug name
get.description: Retrieves metabolism data for a specific drug across all strains. Supports pagination and optional species filtering.
Get list of available score types for PPI filtering

parameters.name: locus_tag

schema.description: Filter interactions involving specific locus tag
schema.title: Locus Tag

parameters.description: Filter interactions involving specific locus tag

get.description: Search for protein-protein interactions with various filtering options. Can search by protein_id (UniProt ID) or locus_tag.
Get all neighbors for a specific protein without algorithm processing. Returns raw interaction data for custom analysis in Jupyter notebooks. Can search by protein_id (UniProt ID) or locus_tag.
Get network data for a specific score type and threshold
Get network properties (nodes, edges, density, clustering) for a specific score type and threshold
Get metadata about the TTP dataset including counts, available compounds, and score ranges.

schema.description: Free-text search term to match against gene names, locus tags, or compound names.

get.description: Search for protein-compound interactions with basic filtering and pagination.

get.description: Check if two genes are orthologs and get their relationship details
Search for ortholog pairs with various filters and pagination

schema.description: Filter by gene (operons containing this gene)

get.description: Search for proteomics evidence data across multiple genes using locus tags and/or UniProt IDs. Supports filtering by minimum coverage, minimum unique peptides, and evidence flag. Returns an array of genes with their proteomics evidence data.
